description.value:
These panpipes are made of what seems to be beat-up tin bound by frayed leather and look like they shouldn't function at all, but in skilled hands they emit a beautiful sound that beguiles the senses. While playing the pipes, you gain a +2 item bonus to Diplomacy and Performance checks.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from this instrument to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Daze]
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Charm], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Command], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Fear]
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Laughing Fit], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Stupefy]
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Charm], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Hypnotize], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Mind Reading], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Ring of Truth]
  • 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Confusion], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Suggestion]
  • 5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Charm], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Glimmer of Charm], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Suggestion], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Telepathy]

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.
